In this research, a Bats‐Hosts‐Reservoir‐People (BHRP) transmission network model for simulating transmission from bats to humans and a Reservoir‐People (RP) transmission network model was developed.
Berkeley Madonna 8.3.18 was employed for curve fitting.
The value of (
R 0 ) was estimated using the next‐generation matrix approach which came out to be 2.30 for reservoir to person and 3.58 for person to person.
